replies.body:
I don't know how much we've actually talked in the past, but what do you think abut me / opinion?

If you could change one thing on Avicus, what would it be and why?

How did you first find this server, and what do you think of it's current direction?
replies.body_tagged:
I don't know how much we've actually talked in the past, but what do you think abut me / opinion?

If you could change one thing on Avicus, what would it be and why?

How did you first find this server, and what do you think of it's current direction?

replies.body:
Hey bud! :) 

I didn't know who you were and I had never heard of you before that giveaway, you know. I appreciate your honesty and the fact that you are not a suck up.

I decided after almost 4 years, at my previous job to resign and start my own business, without any experience as a entrepreneur, at all. It has to be the best decision and the biggest leap of faith I have taken. I plan to skydive and to travel a lot.

I would rather be poor and have a family than being rich and alone.

replies.body:
I have never met you in-game and barely see you on Discord, if someone asked me about you, I wouldn't know you are part of the staff team.

I would change everything.

I think I joined Overcast once, before I found out about Avicus, I remember the first few minutes on Avicus, {tag=9116d3fa14004adaaecd2eae1d73e383} and that CaptainMcPie? spammed "hacker" and "kys", hahaha.

I think you run around like headless chickens, and that's pretty sad.

hey Semel! long time no see. guess I better ask some deep shit. 

what do you think about Sweden being invaded by migrates? 

 opinions on me?

hey Semel! long time no see. guess I better ask some deep shit.

replies.body:
Opinions?

Are you Asian?

Favorite Song?

enter me in the giveaway 4 cape
replies.body_tagged:
Opinions?

Are you Asian?

Favorite Song?

enter me in the giveaway 4 cape

replies.body:
Hey bud!

It is out of control, Swedes are afraid to be perceived as racists or xenophobic. We are and we have been so afraid of being perceived as xenophobes that we have accepted everything and questioned nothing. Our politicians are afraid of explicitly stating that we have problems which of course are related to immigration and integration of other non-secular cultures. Swedes know about this non-spoken threat so they prefer not to engage too much and remain in a bubble where everything is going along just fine, as long as we all take a stance against hatred, racism and intolerance.

We used to talk before, quite a lot actually, but you disappeared. I like your attitude and your honesty.
replies.body_tagged:
Hey bud!

It is out of control, Swedes are afraid to be perceived as racists or xenophobic. We are and we have been so afraid of being perceived as xenophobes that we have accepted everything and questioned nothing. Our politicians are afraid of explicitly stating that we have problems which of course are related to immigration and integration of other non-secular cultures. Swedes know about this non-spoken threat so they prefer not to engage too much and remain in a bubble where everything is going along just fine, as long as we all take a stance against hatred, racism and intolerance.

We used to talk before, quite a lot actually, but you disappeared. I like your attitude and your honesty.
